name: Sticky Balls
summary:
Over 1.3 million games of Sticky Balls have been played! Sticky Balls is the most addictive game on the app store right now. The simple gameplay and sleek look combine with a deceptively difficult gameplay that will have you yelling at your phone while rushing to start your next game!
You will be lulled by the cheery music into bouncing around this minimal world. But along the way you will have to avoid the sticky balls. The more balls that stick to you, the harder it is to fit through the levels. Luckily there are helpful diamonds throughout the game that help remove the balls that latched on. See how high you can go with Sticky Balls!
